Introduction

BamBam is a Thai singer, rapper, and entertainer under HALO Corporation. Originally from Bangkok, Thailand, he was cast by JYP Entertainment at a young age and moved to South Korea for training. He debuted as a member of GOT7 on January 16, 2014, with the single "Girls Girls Girls."

Following the expiration of his contract with JYP Entertainment, BamBam signed with ABYSS Company on March 5, 2021. He made his solo debut in South Korea on June 15, 2021, with the EP "riBBon" and its title track of the same name. In 2023, he launched his YouTube web series "Bam House," where he interviews celebrity guests.

On February 6, 2025, ABYSS Company announced BamBam's departure from the agency.

Fun facts

1
BamBam has a lot of pets. He has three dogs; a husky named Gumiho (female), and black dog named Black, and a brown dog named Fat. He also has four cats named Pudding, Latte, Cupcake and King. His flying squirrel's name is Shabu Shabu.
